Token.Abstract: The A2BlockDelegate category extends features provided by A2DynamicDelegate to create custom block properties in a category on a delegating object and dynamically map them to delegate (UIAlertViewDelegate), data source (UITableViewDataSource), or other delegated protocol (NSErrorRecoveryAttempting) methods.
Synthesizes a property with the given name and links it to the given selector in the data source protocol.

Parameter.Name: propertyName
Parameter.Abstract: A property name to synthesize. Must not be NULL.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: An encoded selector. Must not be NULL.

Token.Abstract: Synthesizes multiple properties and links them to the appropriate selector in the data source protocol.

Parameter.Name: selectorsForPropertyNames
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary with property names as keys and selectors (as strings) as objects.

Token.Abstract: Synthesizes a property with the given name and links it to the given selector in the delegate protocol.

Parameter.Name: propertyName
Parameter.Abstract: A property name to synthesize. Must not be NULL.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: An encoded selector. Must not be NULL.

Token.Abstract: Synthesizes multiple properties and links them to the appropriate selector in the delegate protocol.

Parameter.Name: selectorsForPropertyNames
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary with property names as keys and selectors (as strings) as objects.

Token.Abstract: Synthesizes a property with the given name and links it to the given selector in the given protocol.

Parameter.Name: propertyName
Parameter.Abstract: A property name to synthesize. Must not be NULL.

Parameter.Name: protocol
Parameter.Abstract: A protocol that declares the given selector. Must not be NULL.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: An encoded selector. Must not be NULL.

Token.Abstract: Synthesizes multiple properties and links them to the appropriate selector in the given protocol.

Parameter.Name: protocol
Parameter.Abstract: A protocol that declares all of the given selectors. Must not be NULL.

Parameter.Name: selectorsForPropertyNames
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary with property names as keys and selectors (as strings) as objects.
